attributes.action: treat nurses fairly and give them the pay award the so truly deserve
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: reconsider the paltry 1.5% pay award offered by the government. consider all factors when taking into account the pay award including the amount awarded to MP's in the last financial year

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
